Genus.Rule: Take the first word in the plant name.
Genus.Condition: The genus is always a single capitalized word at the start.

Species.Rule: Take the second word in the plant name.

DecisionTree.Action: Assign this word as 'Species' (true botanical species).
Assign this word as 'Species' (hybrid/grex name treated as species field).

Clone.Rule: Search the plant name for single quotes.
Clone.Condition: If text is found inside single quotes, assign it as 'Clone'.

Cross.Rule: Check for second line or parenthetical text.

DecisionTree.Condition: Contains 'Genus species x Genus species' format
DecisionTree.Example: Cattleya purpurata x Cattleya tenebrosa → Cross = (full string)
